TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IContentNegotiator

Docs.summary: Performs content negotiation. This is the process of selecting a response writer (formatter) in compliance with header values in the request.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Net.Http.Formatting.ContentNegotiationResult Negotiate (Type type, System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage request, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Net.Http.Formatting.MediaTypeFormatter> formatters);

public: System::Net::Http::Formatting::ContentNegotiationResult ^ Negotiate(Type ^ type, System::Net::Http::HttpRequestMessage ^ request, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::Net::Http::Formatting::MediaTypeFormatter ^> ^ formatters);

Docs.param: Request message, which contains the header values used to perform negotiation.
The set of objects from which to choose.
Docs.summary: Performs content negotiating by selecting the most appropriate out of the passed in for the given that can serialize an object of the given .
Docs.returns: The result of the negotiation containing the most appropriate instance, or null if there is no appropriate formatter.
Docs.remarks: Implementations of this method should call on the selected formatter and return the result of that method.
